h2_title: Crimson Silver Cart Boss Fight and Guide
content: To make the fight easier, use Immobilize to keep the cart locked in place. That way, you and the Pale-Axe Stalwart can work together to quickly whittle down its health.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crimson-Silver_Cart.md', within the main section titled 'Crimson-Silver Cart', specifically from the subsection 'Crimson Silver Cart Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
To make the fight easier, use Immobilize to keep the cart locked in place. That way, you and the Pale-Axe Stalwart can work together to quickly whittle down its health.
